word_mean: 〔NF〕松香：松科植物长叶松(Pinus palustris Mill.)和其他种松树中获得的固体树脂，为琥珀色半透明的尖角状碎片，常裹以黄色尘屑。约含90％树脂和10％中性物质。绝大部分树脂酸是枞酸的同分异构体，C44H62O4，用作制备膏药和软膏的致硬剂

sentence.Network_en: The rosin - based polyglucoside is one kind of alkyl polyglucoside ( APG ).
sentence.Network_cn: 松香基葡萄糖苷为烷基糖苷 ( APG ) 的一种.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from medieval Latin rosina, from Latin resina (see resin)

means.word_mean: 1. any of a class of solid or semisolid viscous substances obtained either as exudations from certain plants or prepared by polymerization of simple molecules
